test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "hours". Selects the "hours" element children of the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-2
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "text()". Selects all text node children of the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-3
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "@name". Selects the name attribute of the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-5
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "employee[1]". Selects the first employee child of the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-6
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "para[fn:last()]". Selects the last employee child of the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-7
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "*/hours". Selects all hours grandchildren of the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-8
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "/works/employee[5]/hours[2]". Selects the second hours of the fifth employee of the book whose parent is the document node that contains the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-9
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "employee//hours". Selects the hours element descendants of the employee element children of the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-10
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "//hours". Selects all the hours descendants of the root document node and thus selects all hours elements in the same document as the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-12
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "//overtime/day". Selects all the day elements in the same document as the context node that have an overtime parent.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-13
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, ".//day". Selects the day element descendants of the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-14
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "..". Selects the parent of the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-16
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "employee[@name="Jane Doe 11"]". Selects all employee children of the context node that have a name attribute with a value "Jane Doe 11".

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-17
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "employee[@gender="female"][5]". Selects the fifth element child of the context node that has a gender attribute with value "female".

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-18
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "employee[5][@gender="female"]". Selects the fifth employee child of the context node if that child has a gender attribute with value "female".

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-19
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "employee[status="active"]". Selects the employee children of the context node that have one or more status children whose typed value is equal to the string "active".

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-20
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "employee[overtime]". Selects the employee children of the context node that have one or more overtime children.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-21
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "employee[@name and @type]". Selects all the employee children of the context node that have both a name attribute and a type attribute.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-22
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "employee/(status|overtime)/day". Selects every day element that has a parent that is either a status or an overime element, that in turn is a child of an employee element that is a child of the context node.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-24
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "employee/(status|overtime)/day". Selects every day element that has a parent that is either a status or an overime element, that in turn is a child of an employee element that is a child of the context node. Uses "union" Operator.

test-case.name: abbreviatedSyntax-25
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates abbreviated syntax, "employee[@name=condition or @type=condition]". Selects all the employee children of the context node that have both a name attribute and a type attribute. Uses the "or" operator.
